page.title: 08May Day
page.content: A couple of months ago our school had a May Day celebration.Two May Queens were chosen. It was Julie and I.We were crowned by Miss Neale.First we did some Maypole dancing then we were crowned and then we were pushed in a decorated trolley to the village pub,The Swan,to do some Morris dancing.It was brilliant being pushed in the trolley.After we had finished Morris dancing we came back to school for a tea party.The May Queens sat at the top of the table.We had a lovely tea.The May Queens danced one dance and that was called the Ribbon Dance.Parents came to watch us all dancing at the school and at The Swan in Braybrooke.Usually the two May Queens are the oldest girls from Braybrooke and Arthingworth at our school.
